title: [ADMIN] AgentBase.io Privacy Policy
content:
Privacy Policy

Collection and Use of Personal Information

  1. Information Collection: We may collect personal information from users, such as name, email address, and other contact details, for the purpose of providing our services and facilitating communication.
  2. Data Usage: We will only use personal information for the intended purposes and in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. Personal data will not be shared with third parties without explicit user consent, except as required by law or to fulfill our contractual obligations.

Data Security and Confidentiality

  1. Data Protection Measures: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect personal information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. This includes encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments.
  2. Confidentiality: We maintain strict confidentiality obligations regarding personal information and ensure that only authorized personnel have access to it.

Data Retention

  1. Data Retention Period: Personal information will be retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, unless otherwise required by law.
  2. Data Deletion: At the request of the user or when data is no longer required, we will securely delete or anonymize personal information to ensure its permanent removal from our systems.

Third-Party Services and Data Sharing

  1. Service Providers: We may engage trusted third-party service providers to assist in delivering our services. These providers are bound by confidentiality agreements and will process personal information only as instructed by us.
  2. Legal Requirements: We may share personal information when required by law, legal process, or to protect our rights, privacy, and safety, or that of our users.

User Rights and Choices

  1. Access and Rectification: Users have the right to access and update their personal information. They can request changes or corrections by contacting us directly.
  2. Consent Withdrawal: Users can withdraw their consent for the collection and use of personal information at any time by contacting us or using the provided opt-out mechanisms.

Policy Updates

This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or the nature of our services. Users will be notified of any material changes and given the opportunity to review and accept the revised policy.

Contact Information

For any questions, concerns, or requests related to privacy or data protection, users can contact us using the provided contact details.
